name: 拉蒙特·马吉
introduction: Currently Lamont Magee is a writer/creator at GHOST MACHINE, a first of its kind, creator owned comic book and media company. Magee's first book entitled "THE SOULLESS" will hit the shelves sometime in 2024. Previously, Magee served as a writer/producer on the CW's "BLACK LIGHTNING" and as a consulting producer on the HBO MAX series "GREEN LANTERN". In the animation space, Magee co-developed "YOUNG JEDI ADVENTURES" for LUCASFILM ANIMATION as well as animated projects for MARVEL, DISNEY and DREAMWORKS. Magee has several feature projects at various stages of development with the film Buffalo Flats, co-written by Magee, directed by Emma Westenberg and produced by MGM, set to ramp up production later in the calendar year.
